Where is Paraíso Andino Nature Reserve?
La Vega is home to Paraíso Andino Nature Reserve. Discover the local area by spending a day visiting some of the local attractions. If you're looking for things to see and do in the area, you might like to visit Church of St. Michael the Archangel and Villeta Central Park.
